snippet.title: Extent of phytate degradation in breads and various foods consumed in Saudi Arabia
snippet.description:
* Extent of phytate degradation in breads and various foods consumed in Saudi Arabia (Citations: 3)
Hassan A. Almana
...of phytate degradation followed by pita brown bread, namely burr, in comparison to pita, french and pan white breads...11 to 0.4%. food recipes and baking conditions or cooking...
Journal: Food Chemistry - FOOD CHEM , vol. 70, no. 4, pp. 451-456, 2000
